body.name: JUWO 6 FT Dishwasher Installation Kit, Stainless Steel Dishwasher Water Supply Line with 3/8" Compression Dishwasher Connectors, Short Distance Connection
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Universal Dishwasher Kit】 Includes 3/8" OD supply line with 2 elbow adapters (3/4" FHT & 3/8" MIP) for various dishwashers, and 2 adapters (1/2" Comp & 1/2" FIP) for diverse valves.
【6 FT Water Supply Hose】 Short-distance water supply for small apartments and residences.
【Reinforced Construction】 Durable 304 braided stainless steel and flexible PVC core for corrosion and burst resistance.
【Leakproof Design】 The dishwasher hose kit ensures a secure and leak-free connection with its rubber gasket and solid brass adapter.
【Safe Drinking Water】CUPC certified dishwasher supply line ensures odor-free and safe drinking.
body.description: JUWO offers reliable dishwasher installation kit with standard connectors in various lengths to connect dishwashers to any water source, perfect for residential and commercial use. Warm Tips 1. Before installation, check that the connection points of the dishwasher and water pipe are clean, free from debris, and undamaged. If there are any issues, clean or replace them as necessary. 2. Do not overly stretch or twist, as this can cause it to break or leak. 3. After the connection is completed, gently manipulate the water pipe to ensure that the connection is tight.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About JUWO JUWO has been dedicated to making it easier for customers to locate and obtain feature-rich pipelines for DIY pipeline projects, providing a solution for anyone tired of the limitations and inconvenience of traditional hardware stores. Unlock a new world of possibilities with JUWO pipelines. JUWO offers reliable dishwasher installation kit with standard connectors in various lengths to connect dishwashers to any water source, perfect for residential and commercial use. Warm Tips 1. Before installation, check that the connection points of the dishwasher and water pipe are clean, free from debris, and undamaged. If there are any issues, clean or replace them as necessary. 2. Do not overly stretch or twist, as this can cause it to break or leak. 3. After the connection is completed, gently manipulate the water pipe to ensure that the connection is tight.

Specifications Size Dishwasher Hose Kit (3/8" Female Comp x 3/8" Female Comp); Elbows (3/8" Male Comp x 3/4" FHT, 3/8" Male Comp x 3/8" MIP); Adapters (3/8" Male Comp x 1/2" Female Comp , 3/8" Male Comp x 1/2" FIP) Length 6 FT Plumbing Part Type Dishwasher Drain Hose Material Stainless Steel Features Corrugated Pipe Durability Rust Resistant, Leak Resistant Application Dishwasher Package Included 1Pc Dishwasher Drain Hose, 2Pcs Clamps Quantity 1 Pack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did the exact job it was intended to do - the FIRST time!!
reviews.reviewText: No difficulty installing, very simple and straightforward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Replacement Kit
reviews.reviewText: I got this to install a used dishwasher. All the pieces are very sturdy and are exactly what I was looking for! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for a well built water line.
reviews.reviewText: A well built, durable and true to dimension water line. It came with everything it needed to be properly installed. We really needed this item and for this price I can't imagine any better option.Will definitely get again if I need a quality water line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dishwasher install kit!
reviews.reviewText: I had to do some work on my dishwasher. So I decided to replace the water supply line while I was in there. I am so glad I got this kit. It came with everything I needed. The quality of the hose seems great. The fittings are perfect. Not one drop leaked when I turned the water back on. I think this will last me a long time. Very good dishwasher installation kit and a tremendous value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice installation kit comes with everything you need at 1/2 the price of retail stores
reviews.reviewText: Picked it up just in time to replace my old junk dishwasher with a new model which used different connections from the old one. Great kit and really good selection of quality brass parts. Seals were nice and soft and threads were cut well. No issues at all. No leaks, no kinks, no problems. The supply line was also very well made and the perfect length for my installation. Comes with extra adapters which will save someone time from having to run around looking for 3/8" to1/2" should they end up needing them. The only parts not included (not really expected them to be) was a hose clamp for the dishwasher drain line to disposal or obviously the electrical cable (which was salvaged from the old unit). Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got a new dishwasher and needed to get a new water supply line. This set comes with everything I need. The quality seems good. It is also 6 feet long, which fits well for my needs. I would recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars everything needed for a solid connection
reviews.reviewText: Just recently changed out the discharge hose so I figured while I had the machine out I would upgrade from the plastic hose and this fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This all came in a plastic bag but they were all there. They're all of decent quality and works exactly as they should. The 3/4" hose adapter fits great and made it easy to adapt to the water supply line without any leaking.
